summary: A new, lore-friendly (although made up,) island to explore, with a main quest and a few side quests. Currently not voiced.
descriptionHtml:
Table of Contents
================
1. Description
2. Features
3. Installation
4. Uninstallation
5. Known Issues/Bugs

1. Description
=============

     Clawhaven, a small island off the coast of northeastern Skyrim, has sent a messenger to Windhelm, as a distress call. Although he didn\'t quite make it, you happen to come across his boat wreckage and everything he had with him. His death kicks off the mystery of what happened to him and the island that was his home. 
     However, to discover the mystery of the island and what happened to it\'s inhabitants, you\'re going to have to sail there yourself, and go prepared for whatever you may find there...

2. Features 
===========

I. A completely new, hand-crafted worldspace, separate from Tamriel.
II. A main quest to uncover the secrets of Clawhaven
III. Currently 7 different side quests
IV. 8 New, fleshed out dungeons, along with 3 new miscellaneous interiors
V. Some other things that I can\'t reveal, as it would give away spoilers ;)

3. Installation* 
=============

1. Download file.
2. Extract \"Clawhaven.esp\", \"Textures\", and \"Meshes\" into C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data. Say yes to merge folders.
3. Open Skyrim Launcher and tick \"Clawhaven.esp\" in the \"Data Files\" tab.
4. Play and enjoy!

     *NMM and Wryebash should also work fine; let me know if there\'s any problems.

4. Uninstallation
===============

Remove \"Clawhaven.esp\" from /skyrim/Data, 

5. Known Issues/Bugs
====================

-Water flow: I\'m still working on getting the water to flow down the actual river, and into the lake. Until I do, I won\'t add any other water effects.

If you find any other bugs, please feel free to leave a comment or PM me and I\'ll look into it. Thanks. 

Remember to endorse if you like it! It means a lot to me. 
-kearith
author: kearith
